data.chText: 小孩
data.enText: child

data.chText: 收养；领养
data.enText: to take sb else's child into your family and become its legal parent(s)

data.chText: 鼓励无子女夫妇领养孩子的运动
data.enText: a campaign to encourage childless couples to adopt

data.chText: 领养孩子
data.enText: to adopt a child

data.chText: 她被迫把婴儿给人收养。
data.enText: She was forced to have her baby adopted.

data.chText: 方法
data.enText: method

data.chText: 采用（某方法）；采取（某态度）
data.enText: to start to use a particular method or to show a particular attitude towards sb/sth

data.chText: 三个队处理这个问题的方法各不相同。
data.enText: All three teams adopted different approaches to the problem.

data.chText: 建议
data.enText: suggestion

data.chText: 正式通过，表决采纳（建议、政策等）
data.enText: to formally accept a suggestion or policy by voting

data.chText: 通过一项决议
data.enText: to adopt a resolution

data.chText: 委员会有望在下次会议上正式通过这项新政策。
data.enText: The council is expected to adopt the new policy at its next meeting.

data.chText: 新名字 / 国家
data.enText: new name/country

data.chText: 选用（名字等）；移居（某国）；承袭（风俗）
data.enText: to choose a new name, a country, a custom, etc. and begin to use it as your own

data.chText: 取名；袭用头衔；采用某语言
data.enText: to adopt a name/title/language

data.chText: 欧洲早期的基督教徒承袭了更古老的一些异教的许多习俗。
data.enText: Early Christians in Europe adopted many of the practices of the older, pagan religions.

data.chText: 行为方式
data.enText: way of behaving

data.chText: 采用（某种举止、说话方式等）
data.enText: to use a particular manner, way of speaking, expression, etc.

data.chText: 他摆出一副满不在乎的样子。
data.enText: He adopted an air of indifference.

data.chText: 候选人
data.enText: candidate

data.chText: 选定，选举（某人为候选人或代表）
data.enText: to choose sb as a candidate in an election or as a representative

data.chText: 她被推举为伍德格林选区的议员候选人。
data.enText: She was adopted as parliamentary candidate for Wood Green.

simple_means.memory_skill: ad 加强 + opt 选择 → 一再通过选择 → 采纳

means: 正式通过，表决采纳(建议、政策等)

example: They adopted two children from Nicaragua

tr: take on a certain form, attribute, or aspect
example: His voice took on a sad tone
The story took a new turn
he adopted an air of superiority
The gods assume human or animal form in these fables

tr: take up the cause, ideology, practice, method, of someone and use it as one's own

example: adopt a book for a screenplay

tr: take up and practice as one's own
as of theories, ideas, policies, strategies or plans
take on titles, offices, duties, responsibilities
example: When will the new President assume office?

value.def: If you adopt a new attitude, plan, or way of behaving, you begin to have it.

example.ex: Parliament adopted a resolution calling for the complete withdrawal of troops...
example.tran: 议会采纳了要求全部撤军的决议。

example.ex: Pupils should be helped to adopt a positive approach to the environment.
example.tran: 应帮助学生对环境采取积极的态度。

example.ex: ...the adoption of Japanese management practices by British manufacturing.
example.tran: 英国制造业采取日本的管理方法

value.def: If you adopt someone else's child, you take it into your own family and make it legally your son or daughter.

example.ex: There are hundreds of people desperate to adopt a child...
example.tran: 有数以百计的人渴望领养孩子。

example.ex: The adopted child has the right to see his birth certificate.
example.tran: 被收养的孩子有权看自己的出生证明。

example.ex: A social worker is appointed to interview the prospective adopters.
example.tran: 一名社工被任命对有意收养者进行面试。

example.ex: They gave their babies up for adoption...
example.tran: 他们放弃自己的婴儿，让别人领养。

example.ex: The majority of adoptions are successful.
example.tran: 大多数的收养都是成功的。

value.def: If you adopt a physical position, you move yourself into it.

example.ex: I tried to adopt a curled-up position to avoid damaging my limbs.
example.tran: 我努力保持蜷曲的姿势以免四肢受伤。

value.def: If you adopt a country, you choose it as a place to live.

example.ex: Podulski had joined the U.S. Navy as an aviator, adopting a new country and a new profession.
example.tran: 波度尔斯基加入美国海军当上了飞行员，不仅改了国籍还换了行当。

value.tran: 移居（某国）;选择（某国）定居

value.def: If you adopt an accent or a particular tone of voice, you speak differently from normal, especially to create an effect in a particular situation.

example.ex: He has adopted the accent of a Second World War newscaster...
example.tran: 他承袭了二战时期播音员的口音。

example.ex: The girl was uncertain what to do, or what tone of voice to adopt.
example.tran: 女孩不知道该做什么，也不知道该用什么口气说。

partsOfSpeech.dec: ad 加强 + opt 选择 → 一再通过选择 → 采纳
adopt 采纳；收养 + able 可…的，能…的；具有…性质的 → 可采纳的
adopt 采纳；收养 + ive …的 → 采用的
opt 选择 + ion 表动作 → 选择
option 选择 + al …的 → 可选择的
opt 视力；光 + ic …的 → 眼的，视力的
opt 视力；光 + ician 表人 → 眼镜商
opt 视力；光 + ics …学 → 光学
opto〔= opt〕视力；光 + meter 测量计 → 视力计
opto 视力 + metr〔= meter〕测量计 + ist 从事某职业的人 → 验光师
ad 做…或加强 + apt 适应 → 适应
ad 做…或加强 + dict〔= dic说〕→ 一再说起 → 上瘾
ad 做…或加强 + duc 引导 + e → 一再引导 → 引证，举例
ad 做…或加强 + ept 能力 → 很有能力 → 熟练的
ad 做…或加强 + her 粘 + e → 坚持；粘附
ad 做…或加强 + jac 躺 + ent 具有…性质的 → 躺在一起 → 邻近的
ad 做…或加强 + just 正确 → 使正确 → 调整
ad 做…或加强 + ministr 管理 + ate 做 → 管理；执行
ad 做…或加强 + mir 惊 + e → 很惊喜 → 羡慕
ad 做…或加强 + mon 警告 + ish 使… → 一再警告 → 告诫
ad 做…或加强 + opt 选择 → 做选择 → 采纳
ad 做…或加强 + umbr 影子 + ate 造成 → 出现影子 → 预示
ad 做…或加强 + vent 来 → 来临
ad 做…或加强 + venture 冒险 → 冒险
